name: Minigame Royale
description:
Game Description:

Minigame Royale is a collection of simplistic arcade-type minigames in which players will compete against each other to see who can win more games of their choosing. Players can choose from a variety of games including top-down games, side-view games, shooter games, dodging games, and more!

Download Instructions :

Once the folder is downloaded, please unzip the folder and run the GDW II Final Project file.
